title: league crashes graphics cardhelp?
body:
i have a pretty new computer and everything,m i can run skyrim on highest quality no problem. when i play league it freezes the sound glitches screen goes black for 5-8 seconds and comes back, other time it just freezes the computer and crashes the graphics card( i looked at the stability report.) originally i thought this was because i have a 4k monitor and Display port being used, but i even switched to an hdmi cord and set the resolution to 1920x1080 (witch is what league is set too) but other games that are more graphically intense i can play on 1920x1080 resolution and my graphics card doesn't crash.
any help apprecitated. i have windows 10 64. AMD rx 470 4GB card and an AMD FX-4350 Quad-Core Processor (4.2ghz)and 16gb of ram.

replies.body: drivers are up to date and deffinatly not an old card issue still pretty new and as i said it handles more grpahicly instense games just fine, its JUST league/.

If your stability report has narrowed the issue down to your graphics card, it sounds to me like the main issue might be an out of date graphics card. The card you're using should work fine, but it won't be able to render all the graphics if the driver for it isn't updated with the latest one. 

Check out our article on how to [**update your drivers**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq8) if you aren't familiar, and let me know if that helps!
